Text: i managed to install the game, but after i launch it i can only play multiplayer. i have no access to quick mission or campaign. i tried using large and small install, but with no results. anyone else have this problem?

Keep the CD mounted. I use Daemon Tools Pro, then it should work. If that doesn't help go to the game folder, open the file SETUP.CD with notepad and check the CD-Rom path mentioned there. Maybe you need to change the drive letter to the mounted drive.
